snippet: Braylon Edwards, who wrote on Twitter earlier this month that the “idiots calling shots” were ruining the Jets, was brought in after another wideout was hurt.
abstract: New York Jets wide receiver Braylon Edwards, who criticized Jets front office on Twitter, says he is happy to return to the team.
lead_paragraph: Braylon Edwards, who wrote on Twitter earlier this month that the “idiots calling shots” were ruining the Jets, was brought in after another wideout was hurt.

headline.seo: Braylon Edwards, Recent Critic of Jets, Is Their New Receiver
headline.main: Recent Critic of Jets Settles In as Their New Receiver
headline.print_headline: Recent Critic of Jets Settles In as Their New Receiver
